item.description:
Good News Everyone!
Our usual night seems to be good for (almost) everyone again. With Halloween just around the corner, this month's book is "Something Wicked This Way Comes" by Ray Bradbury. Thank you Ashley for the suggestion! We wanted something spooky and it looks like we have a winner. Thank you everyone who voted in our poll.

We will be meeting again at Pandemonium in Central Square. There is free parking (after 6pm) in Central on Prospect Street. There is also a lot around the corner from Pandemonium on Green Street ($8 for the night). There is also T access and bus connections.

See you there!
-Josh
item.name: October Book Club
